description:
net/http: follow certain redirects after POST requests

Fixes issue 4145

messages.text:

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=3af6f955dc02 ***

net/http: follow certain redirects after POST requests

Fixes issue 4145

LGTM

File src/pkg/net/http/client.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/6923055/diff/5001/src/pkg/net/http/client.go#newcode234
src/pkg/net/http/client.go:234: // TODO: if/when we add cookie support, the redirected request shouldn't
Umm, don't we have cookie support now, if you supply a jar? 
Created golang.org/issue/4528.
